about_the_game: Presenting the Avian Enigma - Soundtrack, Artbook, and Wallpapers—a complete package to immerse you in our game’s universe. Enjoy an exclusive collection of original music crafted by a brilliant Millennial artist, setting the perfect atmosphere. Our Artbook, curated and laid out by a team of exceptionally talented Gen-Z artists, offers a deeper look into the game’s stunning visuals. Plus, don't miss out on a series of breathtaking wallpapers to personalize your devices. Dive into the world of Avian Enigma and experience the creativity and passion of our young artists.
